sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app>
    <v-main>
      <HelloWorld/>

      <PxPaginacion  v-bind:incrementar="incrementar" v-bind:decrementar="decrementar"/>
      <PxDetalle v-bind:assets="assets"   /> 
      


    </v-main>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
import HelloWorld from '@/components/HelloWorld';
import PxPaginacion from '@/components/PxPaginacion';
import PxDetalle from '@/components/PxDetalle';
import app from "@/app";
export default {
  name: 'App',

  components: {
    HelloWorld,PxPaginacion,PxDetalle
  },
  data() {
    return{
      // isLoading: false,
      assets: [],
      cantidad:44,
    }
  },
  
  created() {
    // this.isLoading = true;
    // app
    //   .getPokemons()
    //   .then((assets) => (console.log(assets)))
      // .finally(() => (this.isLoading = false));
    // console.log(this.assets);
    app.fetchData()
    // app.getPokemon(1)
    .then((asset)=>(this.assets=asset))
    .then((asset)=>(this.cantidad=asset.id))

  },
  computed:{
    getResult() {
      return this.cantidad+1;
    },    
  },
};
</script>
<style>
#app {
  font-family: Avenir, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
  text-align: center;
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-top: 60px;
}
/* card */
.body__container { 
        margin: 0 auto;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: center;
        align-items: center;
    }
    .body__profile {
        background: white;
        border-radius: 50px;
        padding: 1.5em 1.75em;
        margin: 2em auto;
        max-width: 330px;
        box-shadow: 0px 3px 136px 0px rgba(88, 87, 119, 0.21);
    }
    .img-background{
      background-color: black;
    }
.card-tile-margin{
  margin-top: -5rem;
}
.card-title{
  font-size: 1.8rem;
  text-transform: capitalize;
  color: hsl(0deg 0% 59%);
  font-weight: 400;
}
/* card footer     */
.card-footer{
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: row;
gap: 2rem;
}
.card-footer-social{
    margin-top: 2rem;
    margin-bottom: 2rem;
}
.card-footer-social h3{
  font-weight: bolder;
  color:black
}
/* foto */
.body__profile__photo img {
        border-radius: 50%;
        width: 200px;
        height: 200px;
        border: 15px solid #fff;
        top: -100px;
        position: relative;
        box-shadow: 1px 2px 18px 4px rgb(226, 226, 226);
    }
</style>
